content.text: I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
That's a great idea! What's her favorite fast food?
She loves Wendy's. I'm going to take her there and get her a big baconator and some fries.
Yum, that sounds delicious! I'm sure she'll love it.
Me too. She's been through a lot, so I want to make this a special day for her.
I'm sure it will be. What else are you going to do to celebrate?
Well, we're going to go out to dinner, and then we're going to watch a movie.
I hope so. I'm just glad she's doing better.
Me too. She's a strong woman.
She is. I'm really lucky to have her as my mom.
I'm sure she's lucky to have you as her son.
